description: This file defines the 'Note' class, which models a note with properties such as id, title, content, color, creation, and update timestamps. It includes methods to convert to/from a map and to create modified copies.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A data class representing a note with an id, title, content, color, creation date, and last update date, along with methods for serialization and copying.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a Map<String, dynamic> suitable for storage or serialization.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a Map<String, dynamic> typically deserialized from storage.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a new Note instance with specified properties replaced, useful for immutability.
